title: Michael Bloomfield - If You Love These Blues  Play 'Em As You Pl
description:
2in1 CD release (2004) of two michael Bloomfield albums

'If You Love These Blues, Play 'Em As You Please' (1976) - tracks 1-22

'Bloomfield/Harris' (1979) - tracks 23-31

'If You Love These Blues, Play 'Em As You Please' is an outstanding album. It was intended as a blues guitar instructional album for Guitar Player magazine. Between the tracks Mike Bloomfield talks about the songs and how to play them. He goes through various electric and acoustic guitar styles and the songs werde designed to illustrate the sounds of guitar heroes like B.B. King, Jimmy Rogers, T-Bone Walker and many more...
